Reviews.Title: Not Satisfy with this product.
Reviews.Author: Davas
Reviews.Content: I wish ti informed you of my experience I have encounter since I have purchase this item. On Saturday 28th January, 2012. I notice that I was not receiving any phone calls on checking I realise that my phone was showing SoS and invalid slim card error message. I took my phone to a phone provider only to be inform by the technician that this phone was a refurbish phone. I could not beleive this and am so disappointed. My phone stil is'nt working what a stressful experience. And this is suppose to be a new phone. I wish to sent back this item to you.Very dissatisfy and discourage customer.......Davaline Atwell

Reviews.Title: not what I wanted
Reviews.Author: RRBD
Reviews.Content: The BB bold 9780 have two models that work in difereants bands, you have to specify this to let customers know if the product is what they are looking for.

Reviews.Title: telefonos reconstruidos
Reviews.Author: douglas vasquez
Reviews.Content: I'm from Venezuela to buy a phone to this company, to the phone came with screen shots and bad sides they told me I had a warranty which I accept I was told that I would change the phone has a new one that they had offices here in Venezuela and with instant long as I will remove the label after I remove the label and they told me at his offices in Venezuela did not have available the same and that they had united states and I had them to send the phone for them to make the change so I leave writing what has happened to me and I would not recommend as they sell phones in poor condition and recontruido the term I give star is -0

Reviews.Title: HOAX
Reviews.Author: Brigido Martinez
Reviews.Content: Buy the phone like new and was used. Then something and failure to unclog armored parts on the card were raped. The frequencies com buy wine with 2,4,8 1,2,5,6 and so not good for my requirements. Would not recommend. was a scam.

Reviews.Title: about the product
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: I have a question, 10days ago i bought this blackberry 9780, the cellphone arrived yesterday and don:t have accesories, only a charger, i want to know if that is the only accesory that the cellphone have, i hope your answer as soon as possible

Reviews.Title: reclamo
Reviews.Author: gabriel
Reviews.Content: se indicaba el envio gratuito y porqué me cobran 6 dolares masBlackBerry Bold 9780 Unlocked Cell Phone with Full QWERTY Keyboard, 5 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, 3G, Music/Video Playback, Bluetooth v2.1, and GPS (Black)

ProductInfo.Features:
Blackberry bold 9780 Manufacturer Unlocked Version. It can work with any GSM carriers, such as AT&T;, T-mobile, worldwide. (Please note that some carriers might require some special specifications)
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800 GSM and 2100/1900/850/800 MHz 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
5 MP Camera, 2592x1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash and video recording; BlackBerry OS 6.0; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g, UMA; Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP; GPS Navigator with A-GPS support and microSD slot, up to 32GB.
Touch-sensitive optical trackpad; Full QWERTY keyboard; Document editor (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF); Media player MP3/WMA/AAC+; Video player DivX/WMV/XviD/3gp; Organizer and SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email, IM
Talk time up to 6 hours - Standby up to 520 hours.
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Bold 9780 Black OEM - Manufacturer Unlocked (No Network Logos) - International Version
